name: portafoglio-alina-galben
description: Portfolio completo di Alina Galben - Full Stack Developer

scripts.dev: start cmd /k "cd backend && npm run dev" && timeout /t 3 && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend

author: Alina Galben
